title: Vegan Roasted Cauliflower Steak
description: Thick cauliflower 'steaks' are seasoned with a smoky, herby spice rub and roasted until caramelized and tender, finished with a bright lemon-tahini drizzle and toasted parsley. This plant-forward main offers savory umami, gentle heat, and crisp edges with a creamy, tangy sauce for contrast.

ingredients.display_name: cauliflower (whole head), trimmed and sliced into steaks
ingredients.notes: remove outer leaves, trim stem so head sits flat; cut into 3/4–1-inch thick slices
divided: part for rubbing steaks and part for roasting if needed
to thin tahini sauce to pouring consistency
adjust or omit for heat preference
divided: for seasoning steaks and sauce

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F). Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly oil it so steaks won't stick.

Prepare the cauliflower: remove outer leaves and trim the stem flush so the head sits flat. Slice the head into 3/4–1-inch thick 'steaks' working from the center; reserve any loose florets for roasting alongside the steaks.
Make the spice rub: combine smoked paprika, ground cumin, minced garlic, red pepper flakes (if using), salt, black pepper, and most of the olive oil to form a paste.
Brush both sides of each cauliflower steak and any reserved florets with the spice rub, ensuring even coverage. Arrange steaks in a single layer on the prepared sheet without overcrowding.

Roast the steaks: place the baking sheet on the middle rack and roast at high heat until deeply caramelized and tender when pierced with a knife, flipping once halfway through to encourage even browning.

While the cauliflower roasts, whisk together tahini, lemon juice, warm water, maple syrup, remaining minced garlic and a pinch of salt until smooth; adjust thickness with small amounts of water to reach a pourable drizzle consistency.

When steaks are done, remove from oven. Arrange on a serving platter, spoon or drizzle the lemon-tahini sauce over each steak, sprinkle with chopped parsley and an optional drizzle of olive oil, and serve immediately.
